item.description:
Kick off Friday night with Providence's signature storytelling event. Live Bait follows the tradition of 'This American Life' and 'The Moth'. A topic is chosen each month and storytellers with something to say come on stage and tell their tale.

This edition of Live Bait comes with a twist. Instead of a single theme, topics will be randomly drawn and anyone with something to say can take the stage to tell their story. The element of surprise should make for a interesting night.

As an added bonus, the band that plays a themed intro to each edition of live bait will play a set of their greatest hits

Come on down, tell a story or just watch the improvisational hijinks unfold.

Since its Friday, we could also make our way someplace Downtown after the show.

LIVE BAIT : Ready or Not - The Musical
7:30pm Friday, October 19th, 2012
Tickets $7.00 – no reservations taken
AS220, 115 Empire St., Providence, RI

 

 

New meetup ideas are always welcome, so if you have any ideas, please contact me or another organizer.

See you there.
item.name: Live Bait: The Musical @ AS220
